element.name: Convert
element.description: This package have functionality of serialize types to string and deSerialize types from string.

element.name: CppProperties
element.description: provides encapsulated properties for C++ - getter and setter functions, getter and setter can be customized via parameter.

element.name: NoSqlDb
element.description: * - IPersist interface - defines the methods needed to * serialize to XML and deserialize from XML * - StringWrapper class that persists strings * - DoubleWrapper class that persists doubles * - Widget class with int and string properties * - WidgetWrapper class that persits Widgets

element.name: Persist
element.description: implementation of key/value pair in-memory database

element.name: TestExec
element.description: this package is the driver of the NoSqlDb, provides ways of using and testing k/v datavase.

element.name: Utilities
element.description: this package contains useful handy functions for project and demostration.

element.name: XmlDocument
element.description: * This package is intended to help students in CSE687 - Object Oriented Design * get started with Project #2 - XML Document Model. It uses C++11 constructs, * most noteably std::shared_ptr. The XML Document Model is essentially * a program-friendly wrapper around an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) used to * contain the results of parsing XML markup.
